description: Retrieves the list of snoozed or dismissed suppressions for a subscription. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.

api_version.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

top.description: The number of suppressions per page if a paged version of this API is being used.

skip_token.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API.

nextlink.description: The link used to get the next page of suppressions.
